nodes.text: Slimego was a male Rodian bounty hunter. Working with the Barabel Slizzik and the Taloron Hunter Crutag, Slimego pursued a group of Rebels to the jungle world of Trinta. Both he and Slizzik were prepared to forgo a larger bounty and deliver the agents dead but Crutag insisted on capturing them alive. In the end, however, they were stranded on the planet by the self-exiled Jedi Halagad Ventor who used the Force to crash their starship and were defeated by their own quarry.
